name: Grandpro Rally Laser Cut Shoes - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features:
A lightweight EVA outsole and minimally reinforced upper reduce weight without sacrificing comfort.
Perforations on the upper along with textile linings allow for breathability.
Ortholite® foam internal footbed for underfoot comfort.
An anatomical last ensures an ideal fit.
Rubberized EVA outsole for increased traction.
